data.eml:eml: A new killifish genus and species from the coastal plains of northeastern Brazil (Teleostei: Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Wilson J. E. M. (2004): A new killifish genus and species from the coastal plains of northeastern Brazil (Teleostei: Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae). Zootaxa 642: 1-10, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158061
